name: ubuntu report
description: ubuntu-report-send - Send or opt-out directly from metric reports without interactions
body:
Ubuntu Report

NAME

ubuntu-report-send - Send or opt-out directly from metric reports without interactions

SYNOPSIS

ubuntu-report send yes|no [flags]

DESCRIPTION

Send or opt-out directly from metric reports without interactions

OPTIONS

-h, --help[=false]
help for send

-u, --url=" ⟨ https://metrics.ubuntu.com"⟩
server url to send report to. Leave empty for default.

OPTIONS INHERITED FROM PARENT COMMANDS

-f, --force[=false]
collect and send new report even if already reported

-v, --verbose[=0]
issue INFO (-v) and DEBUG (-vv) output

SEE ALSO

ubuntu-report(3)

HISTORY

14-Mar-2022 Auto generated by spf13/cobra
headings: OPTIONS INHERITED FROM PARENT COMMANDS
